article: asian share markets closed weaker thursday but the losses were relatively modest after the sharp sell-off wednesday as investors adopted a wait-and-see stance ahead of key chinese economic data due friday , dealers said .
abstract: asian shares weaker but losses tempered after sharp sell-off
